/*cardUseList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.ERP_HIST_CORPCD_USE A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_CARD_INFO B ON A.CARD_NO = REPLACE(B.CARD_BA_NB, '-', '') WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{startDt}, '%Y%m%d') <= A.AUTH_DD AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y%m%d') >= A.AUTH_DD
AND (B.TR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR A.CARD_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%'))
ORDER BY A.AUTH_DD DESC
